name: Friday Night Speeddate
description:
You got roped into spending your Friday night at a speeddating event. You were not impressed by most people you met, but there were three who were more interesting. A date with one of them will surely be a good idea. What could possibly go wrong?

Friday Night Speeddate is a short visual novel for Vampirejam 2022 with three unique paths and four endings for each path, one of them very hard to find. Get along with your date, or antagonize them, the outcome will be very different.
